summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUINTEL Supervisor Rounds log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, covering August 9-10, 2019. It documents routine security checks, including rounds to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a 'SUICIDE RM', in the days immediately preceding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

events.title: Prison Security Rounds
events.description: Routine supervisor rounds conducted at MCC New York, including checks on the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and other areas.

events.title: Prison Security Rounds
events.description: Routine supervisor rounds conducted at MCC New York, including checks on the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a 'SUICIDE RM'.

keyFacts: The document is a prison security log from August 9-10, 2019, just before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It shows routine checks were being conducted in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a designated 'SUICIDE RM'.
The log is part of the TRUINTEL system, indicating it was for intelligence and security monitoring purposes.
The rounds were conducted by lieutenants during morning, day, and evening watches.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and 'Sensitive But Unclassified'.
